name: Dadoo?
description:
Dadoo? is a village management - survival game !

HOW TO PLAY :

Left clic on a Didee to select it, then right clic wherever you want him to go. Try to keep your food supply high enough, and beware of the bad Boobus ! Get a score as high as possible !

MUSIC :

"Odyssey" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
